revisions.rev:
The '''Domain Assurance Council''' (DAC) is a trade association started in Summer 2006 by [[Paul Hoffman (VPNC)|Paul Hoffman]] and [[John Levine]]<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.circleid.com/posts/dkim_domain_assurance_email/ |title=Making DKIM More Useful with Domain Assurance Email |author=[[John Levine]] |date=Aug 11, 2006 |publisher=CircleID |accessdate=2010-08-27}}</ref>.
==Members== Members of DAC are divided into categories. They include<ref>{{cite web |url=http://domain-assurance.org/member-list.phtml |title=Domain Assurance Council Membership List |accessdate=2010-08-27}}</ref> *Full Members **[[Goodmail]] **Habeas **ReturnPath **[[Trend Micro]] *Technology Members **[[Alt-N Technologies]] *Client Members **[[Constant Contact]] *ISP Members **[[Go Daddy]]
==See also== *[[Vouch by Reference]] *[[DKIM]]
==References== {{Reflist}}
==External links== *[http://www.domain-assurance.org/ Official website]
[[Category:Anti-spam]]
